title: Create or Amend Coding Out underpayment and debt amounts
description: Create or Amend Coding Out underpayment and debt amounts

payeUnderpayments.description: The total coding out amount attributed to PAYE underpayments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

selfAssessmentUnderPayments.description: The total coding out amount attributed to Self Assessment underpayments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

debts.description: The total coding out amount attributed to HMRC classified debts (i.e. Self Assessment, Class 2 National Insurance debts, tax credit overpayments). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

inYearAdjustments.description: The total coding out amount attributed to in-year tax code adjustments to collect underpayments or debts. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
